message:
SYSTEM: Designing_a_Text_Classification_System_using_Statistical_NLP.pdf: Página 5
Introduction 
Problem Definition 
S=(Q, U, R)  
Q = System queries, U=User questions,  
R = U x Q,  relates user questions with system queries 
 
We need to find:  
f (u ϵ U)={q ϵ Q : (u , q) ϵ R} 
 
If we think of system queries as categories we can address 
this problem as a text classification problem 
 
<Cuál es la información de los prod.., ?c>
speaker: SYSTEM
